    • Method Detail

      • spawnHUD

        public static void spawnHUD(Player player,
                            HUDPosition position,
                            int maxLines,
                            ArrayList<String> lines)
        Spawns a HUD into the player's view with the given text lines at the given position. The method will do nothing if the player already has a hud at the given position.
        Parameters:
        player - The player for whom to spawn the HUD
        position - The position of the HUD on the screen
        maxLines - The maximum number of lines the HUD can have. Any additional lines exeeding this value will not be displayed.
        lines - The lines to text to display on the HUD Throws IllegalArgumentException if maxLength is less than 1

      • spawnHUD

        public static void spawnHUD(Player player,
                            HUDPosition position,
                            int maxLines,
                            BufferedImage image,
                            int width,
                            int height)
        Spawns a HUD into the player's view displaying the given image at the given position. The method will do nothing if the player already has a hud at the given position.
        Parameters:
        player - The player for whom to spawn the HUD
        maxLines - The maximum number of lines the HUD can have. If image's height is greater than this value then the additional lines of the image will be cut off.
        position - The position of the HUD on the screen
        image - The image to display on the HUD
        width - The width of the HUD (The input image width will be resized to match this value)
        height - The heigiht of the HUD (The input image height will be resized to match this value) Throws IllegalArgumentException if maxLength is less than 1 or if width or height is less than 1

      • updateHUD

        public static void updateHUD(Player player,
                             HUDPosition position,
                             ArrayList<String> lines)
        Updates a HUD for a player at the given position if it exists with the input lines of text The method does nothing if a HUD does not exist at the given position for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose HUD is getting updated
        position - The position of the HUD to update
        lines - Lines of text to display on the HUD

      • updateHUD

        public static void updateHUD(Player player,
                             HUDPosition position,
                             BufferedImage image,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Updates a HUD for a player at the given position if it exists with the input image. The method does nothing if a HUD does not exist at the given position for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose HUD is getting updated
        position - The position of the HUD to update
        image - The image to display on the HUD
        width - The width of the HUD (The input image width will be resized to match this value)
        height - The heigiht of the HUD (The input image height will be resized to match this value) Throws IllegalArgumentException if width or height is less than 1

      • removeHUD

        public static void removeHUD(Player player,
                             HUDPosition position)
        Removes a HUD from a player's view at the given position if it exists
        Parameters:
        player - The player for whom the HUD will be destroyed
        position - The position of the HUD to remove

      • removeAllHUDs

        public static void removeAllHUDs(Player player)
        Remove all of a player's HUDs from view
        Parameters:
        player - The player for whom all HUDs will be removed
